content.text: 0) In a small bowl, whisk first six ingredients until smooth; chill.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "whisk"@20:25 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( "first six ingredients"@26:47 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-0 )
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
			:ref ( ing-3 )
			:ref ( ing-4 )
			:ref ( ing-5 )
		)
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until smooth"@48:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-0-1 "chill"@62:67 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Just before serving, combine chicken, raisins, almonds and parsley in a large bowl; add dressing and toss.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@24:31 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-6 "chicken"@32:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "raisins"@41:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "almonds"@50:57 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "parsley"@62:69 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large bowl"@73:85 / TOOL )
		:duration ( cond-1-0 "before serving"@8:22 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "add"@87:90 / AC
		:ppt ( "dressing"@91:99 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-2 "toss"@104:108 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
